DUAL-POB Examples

Introduction

Example's list:

  • A simpe hello world on UART: Hello World.
  • A ping pong between the DUAL-POB and your computer: Ping pong.
  • Move a servomotor: Move servo.
  • Init the bluetooth radio module: Bluetooth.
  • Use the DC Motor: DC Motor.
  • How to use the joystick of the DUAL-POB: Joystick.
  • Read the analog channel: Analog channel.
  • Use the Robotis AX-12 servomotors: AX-12 servomotors.
  • Read and write the EEPROM memory: EEPROM Memory.
  • An example to use the DUAL-POB as I2C bus master: I2C Bus.
  • Write on digital output and use the timer: Digital output.
  • A second example for the AX-12 servomotors: AX-12 servomotors (example 2).
  • An advanced example to move multiple servomotors: Move multiple servomotors.
  • Read data from flash memory of the DUAL-POB: Flash read.

Source code location:

You can find DUAL-POB source code and POB-TOOLS project file on your computer at this location:

C:/Program Files/POB-Technology/PobTools/sdk/dualpob/examples
